description: Escoffier è un celebre chef di Fontaine, maestro nell'arte culinaria e nel supportare i suoi alleati con piatti infuocati e abilità di Pyro.
info: Escoffier è un supporto Pyro che potenzia i danni del team e fornisce cure tramite le sue abilità culinarie. Costruiscilo con Energy Recharge e Pyro DMG Bonus.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Culinary Precision
skills.desc: Performs up to 5 precise sword strikes infused with Pyro.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 5 precise sword strikes infused with Pyro.
Charged Attack
Consumes stamina to unleash a flurry of fiery slashes.
Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, dealing AoE Pyro DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Flambé Technique
skills.desc: Unleashes a wave of fire, dealing AoE Pyro DMG and increasing the ATK of all nearby allies.
skills.details_html:
Flambé Technique
Unleashes a wave of fire, dealing AoE Pyro DMG and increasing the ATK of all nearby allies for 10s.

skills.name: Signature Dish: Inferno Feast
skills.desc: Summons a grand Pyro banquet, healing allies and boosting their Pyro DMG Bonus.
skills.details_html:
Inferno Feast
Summons a grand Pyro banquet, healing allies and boosting their Pyro DMG Bonus for 12s. Healing and bonus scale with Escoffier's ATK.

passive_talents.name: Master Chef's Touch
passive_talents.desc: After using Flambé Technique, all party members gain 10% increased ATK for 10s.

passive_talents.name: Pyro Infusion
passive_talents.desc: Signature Dish: Inferno Feast grants 15% Pyro DMG Bonus to all allies for its duration.

passive_talents.name: Gourmet Supplier
passive_talents.desc: When Escoffier cooks a dish perfectly, he has a 20% chance to double the product.

constellations.name: C1: Searing Appetite
constellations.desc: Flambé Technique grants an additional 10% ATK bonus.

constellations.name: C2: Culinary Inspiration
constellations.desc: Signature Dish: Inferno Feast also increases all party members' Energy Recharge by 15%.

constellations.name: C3: Pyro Perfection
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Flambé Technique by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: C4: Banquet Master
constellations.desc: Allies healed by Inferno Feast gain 20% increased Healing Bonus for 10s.

constellations.name: C5: Infernal Upgrade
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Signature Dish: Inferno Feast by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: C6: Supreme Saucier
constellations.desc: When an ally receives a Pyro-related buff from Escoffier, their CRIT Rate is increased by 10% for 8s.
